Text:
are these the most recent version?
as in... is Crimson Echoes the 99% complete one?
and is FoE the one that was updated at New Years?

thanks for the answer, in advance!
Yes, these are the most recent, as far as I'm aware. This is the version of Crimson Echoes that got Let's Played on Youtube, for example.
So I've never played this game, and am confused as to why there are multiple versions...

There are multiple versions of this game because these are fan-made hacks of the original Chrono Trigger (SNES). You can play the original to get the intended experience, or you can mod the game with one of the fan-made patches. These files have already been patched.
